tool_description: 🌟 Want to know how many stars your product review deserves? Look no further than StarPredictAI! Our AI model is fine-tuned for sentiment analysis on product reviews and can predict star ratings from 0 to 5 with high accuracy. With support for over 140 languages, StarPredictAI can help you gain valuable insights into your product's customer satisfaction. 🚀
name: StarPredictAI - AI-powered Text Review Star Predictor
title: StarPredictAI - AI-powered Text Review Star Predictor
tool_name: StarPredictAI - AI-powered Text Review Star Predictor

api_list.description: 🌟 Our API can analyze text in over 140 languages
